text: Carlos Alberto Ospina Hernández (born 10 September 1982 in Nechí) is a Colombian former professional cyclist. ==Major results== ;2008 : 3rd Overall Cinturón a Mallorca ;2009 : 1st Prologue (TTT) Vuelta a Colombia ;2010 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships ;2011 : 2nd Road race, National Road Championships ;2013 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships ;2014 : 3rd Tobago Cycling Classic ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:South American Games bronze medalists for Argentina Category:South American Games medalists in cycling Category:Competitors at the 2010 South American Games
title: Carlos Ospina
